amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection Of Persons And Property
amendatorysection.para: A petition under section 30-3415 or 30-3421 may be filed by any of the following:
(3) The spouse, parent, sibling, or adult child of the principal;
(4) A close adult friend of the principal;
(6) The attending physician or other health care provider; or
